metadata.Title: CVE-2023-21106 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.Description: In adreno_set_param of adreno_gpu.c, there is a possible memory corruptiondue to a double free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege withno additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not neededfor exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-265016072References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
